item.title: What Happens When a Political Junky Unplugs?
item.description: I gave up news for Lent. I also stayed away from blogging. I’m trying to have fewer opinions about fewer things. When you have a lot of opinions about a lot of things, nothing is more important than anything else. But that’s ridiculous. Some things are more important than others. Some questions must be answered before others. So I gave up news for Lent, and I might never go back.
